items.title: Sleep Tracking Is Just Making You More Anxious. Here’s What Science Says You Should Do Instead
items.description: Apple new Sleep Score is the latest in a growing trend that isn’t necessarily making us more rested.

items.title: The White House Keeps Crowning Stock Market Winners
items.description: The U.S. took a 10 percent stake in Trilogy Metals and the stock soared over 200 percent.

items.title: Anthropic and IBM Are Teaming Up to Build an AI-Powered Coding Tool
items.description: Microsoft and Deloitte also recently partnered with Anthropic on similar AI tools for enterprises.

items.title: How to Unlock Innovation With the Kaizen and Kaikaku Methods
items.description: Growth companies that master both continuous improvement and breakthrough innovation outpace those that only optimize.

items.title: Meet the Gen-Z Founder Building the Canva of Memes
items.description: Getting attention online has never been harder. Jason Levin’s Memelord Technologies has an answer: sell memes-as-a-service.
